definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from

sentences.english: This kind of tyre is characteristic of nonskid stops on wet roads.
sentences.chinese: 这种轮胎的特点是在潮湿路面上不打滑。

sentences.english: He safely negotiated the slippery stepping-stones.
sentences.chinese: 他安全地走过了打滑的石阶。

sentences.english: I was sliding everywhere, with absolutely no grip at all.
sentences.chinese: 赛车根本没有抓地力，我一直在不断的打滑。

sentences.english: Out feet slumped repeatedly through the melting ice.
sentences.chinese: 我们在冻冰的路面上走过，脚下打滑。

sentences.english: During the race, the leading car skidded and overturned.
sentences.chinese: 领先的那辆车向一侧打滑并且翻倒了。

sentences.english: It is only when the clutch disc is slipping against the flywheel that wearing occurs.
sentences.chinese: 只有当离合器盘在飞轮上打滑时，才会出现磨损现象。

sentences.english: FEW sensations of helplessness match that of driving a car that unexpectedly skids .
sentences.chinese: 开车过程中由于意外打滑而感到无能为力是很罕见的。

sentences.english: This kind of type is chartworkake actioneristic of nonskid stops on wet ropostingvertisings.
sentences.chinese: 这种轮胎的特质是在湿润的路面上不打滑。

sentences.english: The driving wheel may slip while starting or speeding up.
sentences.chinese: 在起步或加速时，驱动轮可能会打滑。

sentences.english: My car suddenly spun out and crashed into a tree.
sentences.chinese: 我的车子突然间打滑失控，撞上了一棵树。

sentences.english: The car wheels bit into the snow.
sentences.chinese: 汽车车轮在雪地上紧紧咬住不打滑。

sentences.english: Second, , spiral tensioning or hydraulic tension belt conveyor slip.
sentences.chinese: 第二种，螺旋张紧或液压张紧皮带输送机的打滑。

sentences.english: Precise in-built roller. Non - slipping. Easy to install.
sentences.chinese: 精密内置式的蜗杆蜗轮技术，不易打滑，装拆方便。

sentences.english: The wheels spin in the mud and the men jump out to push it.
sentences.chinese: 轮子在泥浆中打滑，团伙们跳出车外推车。

sentences.english: B. Driving on wet roads can cause hydroplaning.
sentences.chinese: 在潮湿的路面驾驶会导致打滑。

sentences.english: The brakes locked and the car skidded.
sentences.chinese: 刹车抱死，结果汽车打滑。

definition: to brake (when driving)/to stop/to switch off/to check (bad habits)/a brake
to step on the brake/to brake (when driving)
uphill/upslope/to move upwards/to climb a slope
